statements: UPDATE genetic_variations SET amino_acid_change = 'Serine to Threonine' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE genetic_variations SET reference_genome = 'GRCh38' , variation_type = 'Insertion' WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
UPDATE genetic_variations SET amino_acid_change = 'P97S' WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' AND variation_type = 'SNP';
UPDATE genetic_variations SET reference_genome = 'GRCh38' WHERE gene_name = 'TP53' AND amino_acid_change = 'R248Q';
UPDATE GeneticVariations SET gene_name='BRCA1' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE MutationAnalysis SET analysis_result='Positive' WHERE analysis_id=5;
UPDATE GeneticVariations SET gene_name='BRCA1', mutation_type='Deletion' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE MutationAnalysis SET analysis_result='Positive', analysis_date='2022-10-15' WHERE patient_id=100 AND variation_id=2;
UPDATE Variations SET impact='High' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Samples SET quality='Good', tissue_type='Blood' WHERE sample_id=2;
UPDATE Variations SET impact = 'High', gene_name = 'BRCA1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Samples SET quality = 'Good', tissue_type = 'Blood' WHERE sample_id = 101;
UPDATE variations SET mutation_description = 'New mutation description' WHERE variation_id = 1;
UPDATE patients SET age = 40, diagnosis = 'Updated diagnosis' WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE variations SET mutation_description = 'New mutation description' WHERE variation_id = 1;
UPDATE patients SET age = 35, diagnosis = 'Updated diagnosis' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE genetic_variations SET mutation_type='Substitution', nucleotide_change='C>T' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE mutation_effects SET effect_type='Pathogenic', impact_score=5 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE genetic_variations SET gene_name = 'BRCA1', mutation_type = 'Frameshift', nucleotide_change = 'c.1234delA' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE mutation_effects SET effect_type = 'Loss of Function', impact_score = 5, phenotype = 'Increased Cancer Risk' WHERE variation_id = 1;
